Rig Move Services Statement

At Ryboa Haima, we are committed to delivering unparalleled rig move services tailored specifically for the oil and gas industry. Our extensive expertise in rig relocation ensures a seamless transition that minimizes downtime and optimizes operational efficiency. Recognizing the critical nature of timely and safe rig movements, we provide a complete suite of services that encompass every stage of the rig move process, from meticulous planning to successful execution and post-move evaluations.

Comprehensive Rig Move Solutions

1. Detailed Pre-Move Planning

  • Site Assessments: Our rig move process begins with thorough assessments of both the current and prospective rig locations. We analyze environmental conditions, terrain types, and access routes to identify potential challenges. This proactive approach enables us to devise tailored solutions that accommodate the unique characteristics of each site
  • Logistics Strategy Development: We create comprehensive logistics plans that detail transportation routes, equipment needs, and timelines for each phase of the move. Our team coordinates with local authorities, transport providers, and other stakeholders to ensure all logistical elements are aligned for a smooth transition.
  • Risk Mitigation Planning: Anticipating risks is essential for a successful rig move. We identify potential hazards, including weather-related disruptions, road restrictions, and equipment availability issues. By developing mitigation strategies, we ensure that the rig move proceeds safely and efficiently.

2- Rig Preparation and Disassembly

Thorough Inspections

Prior to the move, our qualified personnel conduct detailed inspections of the rig and all associated equipment. This ensures that all systems are operational and safe for transport, preventing delays and potential issues during relocation

Safe Disassembly Procedures

Our team expertly disassembles the rig while adhering to strict safety protocols. Each component is carefully secured and packed to prevent damage during transportation, ensuring that all tools and equipment arrive at the new location in optimal condition

3. Specialized Transportation Solutions

Heavy Haul Transport

We utilize state-of-the-art heavy haul vehicles specifically designed for transporting large and complex rig components. Our logistics experts ensure compliance with all local regulations and secure necessary permits to facilitate safe transport

Marine Transport Services

For offshore relocations, we provide comprehensive marine transport solutions. Our experienced team coordinates the use of barges and tugboats to navigate coastal and offshore environments, ensuring timely and efficient movement of the rig.

4. Rig Installation and Commissioning

Expert Site Setup

Upon arrival, our team oversees the rig installation, ensuring precise alignment and leveling to meet operational requirements. We implement efficient assembly processes to expedite the rig’s readiness for immediate operation

Systems Reconnection and Testing

Our specialists reconnect all critical systems, including drilling, power, and safety components. We conduct thorough functionality tests to confirm that every system operates correctly and meets performance standards

5. Commitment to Safety and Compliance

Adherence to HSE Standards

Safety is at the forefront of our operations. We strictly adhere to Health, Safety, and Environmental (HSE) standards throughout the rig move process, ensuring the well-being of all personnel and the protection of the environment

Regulatory Compliance Assurance

We navigate the complex landscape of local and international regulations, securing all necessary permits and approvals for rig moves. Our meticulous documentation practices ensure accountability and transparency throughout the process

6. Operational Continuity and Communication

Minimizing Operational Downtime

Our extensive planning and coordination efforts are focused on minimizing downtime during the rig move. We work closely with your drilling teams to ensure that operations can resume quickly and efficiently after the rig is relocated

Stakeholder Communication

Throughout the rig move, we maintain open lines of communication with all stakeholders. Regular updates on progress, challenges, and adjustments to plans are communicated to ensure that everyone involved is informed and aligned

7. Post-Move Evaluation and Reporting

Rig Functionality Assessments

After the move, our team conducts comprehensive evaluations to verify that all systems are operational and that the rig is fully prepared for drilling activities. We address any issues that arise promptly to ensure a smooth transition

Detailed Reporting

We provide clients with comprehensive reports detailing the rig move process, including timelines, logistical challenges, and solutions implemented. These reports serve as valuable resources for future planning and continuous improvement

At Ryboa Haima, we pride ourselves on our ability to deliver exceptional rig move services that enhance operational efficiency and support the success of your drilling operations in the oil and gas industry. Our dedicated team of professionals, advanced logistics capabilities, and unwavering commitment to safety and regulatory compliance position us as your trusted partner in navigating the complexities of rig relocation. With our comprehensive approach, we ensure that your rig moves are executed with precision, allowing you to focus on your core operations while we manage the logistics of the relocation process.
